title: Top Places to visit in Mahisagar, Lunavada, Gujarat
content:
Mahisagar is an Indian drama television series which premiered on 7 October 2013 on BIG Magic and ended on 15 April 2015 with 400 episodes. The series is produced by J.D. Majethia of Hats Off Productions. It stars Anuj Thakur and Dharti Bhatt.

title: Top Places to visit in Kutch, Bhuj, Gujarat
content: Kutch district is a district of Gujarat state in western India. Covering an area of 45,674 km², it is the largest district of India. The population of Kutch is about 2,092,000. title: Top Places to visit in Kheda, Nadiad, Gujarat
content: Kheda, also known as Kaira, is a city and a municipality in the Indian state of Gujarat. It was the former administrative capital of Kheda district. Kheda city is famous for Tobacco Farming. title: Top Places to visit in Junagadh, Gujarat
content:
Culture
Junagadh has a zoo named Sakkarbaug Zoological Garden known as Sakkarbaug Zoo established in 1863 in the area of around 200 hectares. The zoo provides purebred Asiatic lions for the Indian and the international endangered species captive breeding program for the critically endange

title: Top Places to visit in Jamnagar, Gujarat
content: Jamnagar is a city located on the western coast of India in the state of Gujarat in Saurashtra region. It is the administrative headquarters of the Jamnagar District. Jamnagar is the largest city on the westernmost side of India and is the fifth largest city of Gujarat state after Ahmedabad, Sura

Top Places to visit in Dahod, Gujarat
content: Dahod is a small city on the banks of the Dudhimati River in Dahod District in the State of Gujarat, India. Top Places to visit in Botad, Gujarat
content:
Botad is a city and district headquarters of Botad district, Gujarat, India. It is about 92 km from Bhavnagar and 133 km From Ahmedabad by road distance.
